meanings.sent1: Her technophilia was evident in the way she eagerly embraced every new gadget.
meanings.sent2: His technophilia led him to spend hours exploring the latest advancements in computer science.
meanings.sent3: The technophilia of the young student was so intense that they even dreamt in binary code!
meanings.sent4: His technophilia was like a never-ending journey through a digital wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the buzzing energy of technophilia during the tech conference.

meanings.definition: The love of or enthusiasm for technology.
meanings.sent1: Their technophilia was contagious, inspiring others to embrace the wonders of the digital world.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was fueled by the technophilia of its innovative employees.
meanings.sent3: The technophilia of the robot was evident in its gleaming metallic exterior.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, his technophilia shone brightly like a beacon of progress.
meanings.sent5: The city pulsated with the heartbeat of technophilia, driving its technological evolution.
